abstract: Bank of America announced on Monday that it would sell most of its remaining holdings in China Construction Bank to a group of unidentified investors, in a deal projected to raise $1.8 billion.
snippet: Bank of America announced on Monday that it would sell most of its remaining holdings in China Construction Bank to a group of unidentified investors, in a deal projected to raise $1.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America announced on Monday that it would sell most of its remaining holdings in China Construction Bank to a group of unidentified investors, in a bid to bolster its capital buffer.

headline.main: Bank of America to Sell Most of Its Stake in Chinese Lender
